name: Voice
text: Today is the day of the tournament ya dumbass. Why do I have to be the voice inside your head anyway?

name: Bob
text: Well, I don't want you either but what can we do?

name: Bob
text: Tell me, what's with this tournament again?

name: Voice
text: You have to fight with various beings, basically. It could be pretty dangerous.

name: Voice
text: I will give you some suggestions in the fight, don't worry

name: Bob
text: Wow, somebody is having a great mood today!

name: Voice
text: Yeah, whatever... Let's go to the shop first.
